title: Squid Shooter

controls: Mouse: Look aroundWASD: MoveW + Shift: SprintSpace: JumpLeft Mouse Button: ShootRight Mouse Button (Hold): AimMouse Wheel: Next/Previous Weapon1-7: Weapon hotkeysR: ReloadF: Knife Attack 1Q: Knife Attack 2G: Throw GrenadeT: Inspect WeaponE: Remove/Holster Weapon
content.howToPlay:
You begin in a sandy playground setting, much like the memorable Red Light, Green Light arena from the show, but you’re armed to the teeth this time!

Hordes of green-uniformed participants shuffle toward you, and pink-hooded guards step in to lend them support. Don’t forget the giant dolls, reminiscent of the enormous figure from the first episode. Your mission is to stay alive. Dodge side to side and jump over obstacles to avoid lumps of enemies. Shoot your foes before they overwhelm you, and dodge anything they throw your way like cash grenades and coffin crates that explode on impact.

Run and jump around to avoid getting cornered, and switch your weapons with the mouse wheel or number keys for a perfect shot. Your arsenal includes everything from pistols and SMGs to full-blown bazookas! Lobbing a grenade (G) into a group of green suits can clear a path fast. When you spot a giant doll, use a bazooka or grenade launcher for maximum damage. They can soak up a lot of bullets!

The game escalates in difficulty as you progress, with waves growing more intense, so keep your aim steady and your reflexes sharp.
content.developer: GoGoMan cleverly mixes references from Squid Game with over-the-top shooter mechanics. There’s no official tie to the Netflix show, but the spirit of high-stakes survival is definitely here. If you like comedic shooters that tip their hat to popular TV series, you’ll appreciate the playful spin GoGoMan created. If you'd like to play more games by them, you can try Funny Shooter!

fullContent: Home› First Person ShooterSquid ShooterBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenIf you’re a fan of the popular Netflix series Squid Game, then Squid Shooter on OnlineGames.io will feel like you’ve stepped right into that high-stakes world, but with a twist! This free online game uses the show’s iconic green tracksuits, pink-suited guards, and menacing giant dolls as your enemies. Except now, you’re heavily armed! Instead of playing children’s games with deadly twists, you’ll be in a frantic shooter, blasting away waves of enemies in a playground arena. It’s funny, a bit wild, but an awesome way to reimagine the show’s shocking moments in a more lighthearted style of video games.So don't wait, trade kids’ games for guns and grenades in this wild browser shooter. Colorful cartoon style, extremely fast pace rounds, and loads of weapons... Gather your courage, lock and load, and see if you can blast through the entire Squid army in this free online game!ControlsMouse: Look aroundWASD: MoveW + Shift: SprintSpace: JumpLeft Mouse Button: ShootRight Mouse Button (Hold): AimMouse Wheel: Next/Previous Weapon1-7: Weapon hotkeysR: ReloadF: Knife Attack 1Q: Knife Attack 2G: Throw GrenadeT: Inspect WeaponE: Remove/Holster WeaponHow to Play Squid ShooterYou begin in a sandy playground setting, much like the memorable Red Light, Green Light arena from the show, but you’re armed to the teeth this time!Hordes of green-uniformed participants shuffle toward you, and pink-hooded guards step in to lend them support. Don’t forget the giant dolls, reminiscent of the enormous figure from the first episode. Your mission is to stay alive. Dodge side to side and jump over obstacles to avoid lumps of enemies. Shoot your foes before they overwhelm you, and dodge anything they throw your way like cash grenades and coffin crates that explode on impact.Run and jump around to avoid getting cornered, and switch your weapons with the mouse wheel or number keys for a perfect shot. Your arsenal includes everything from pistols and SMGs to full-blown bazookas! Lobbing a grenade (G) into a group of green suits can clear a path fast. When you spot a giant doll, use a bazooka or grenade launcher for maximum damage. They can soak up a lot of bullets!The game escalates in difficulty as you progress, with waves growing more intense, so keep your aim steady and your reflexes sharp.FeaturesComical shooter Inspired by Squid Game18 Weapon choices including rifles, pistols, shotguns, sniper rifles, and even rocket launchers.Zany playground reminiscent of the show’s setsLevels ramp up quickly,Humorous chaos including explosions, confetti-like coffins, and silly, low poly characters.DeveloperGoGoMan cleverly mixes references from Squid Game with over-the-top shooter mechanics. There’s no official tie to the Netflix show, but the spirit of high-stakes survival is definitely here. If you like comedic shooters that tip their hat to popular TV series, you’ll appreciate the playful spin GoGoMan created. If you'd like to play more games by them, you can try Funny Shooter!Editor’s ReviewI tried Squid Shooter after binge-watching the entire Squid Game series, and it felt oddly satisfying to finally fight back against those spooky giant dolls! Charging through an army of teal tracksuits while wielding a bazooka made me laugh out loud. Some might consider this brainrot, but in my opinion, it’s a prety neat combination of funny style, action, and a splash of pop culture references. Perfect for those times you want to let off steam and imagine you’re flipping the script on the show’s challenges.This article was updated on March 21, 20253DActionBattleCrazyFirst Person ShooterFreeGunHorrorShootingUnityWeapon
